snippet: The financial industry increasingly finds itself at the center of the economic debate. | Wall Street is preparing for a new phase of federal oversight. | Increasingly, hedge funds are exerting political and economic influence. | Private equity firms...
abstract: The financial industry increasingly finds itself at the center of the economic debate. | Wall Street is preparing for a new phase of federal oversight. | Increasingly, hedge funds are exerting political and economic influence. | Private equity firms are rarely private anymore.
